kDesc
Kiss him goodnight before he squeezes you tight but don't be so fooled, his bark's worse than his bite! [#Legal]
Le zombie mutant sonique de compagnie d'All Zombies Must Die! Il ressemble à un zombie, mais en plus gros et en plus moche. [#Legal]
Der All Zombies Must Die!-Schallmutanten-Begleiter. Klingt wie ... ein Zombie, nur größer und grässlicher. [#Legal]
Il compagno mutante sonico di All Zombies Must Die! È un po' come uno zombi, solo… più grande e più brutto. [#Legal]
El compañero mutante sónico de All Zombies Must Die! Parece… un zombi, solo que más grande y más feo. [#Legal]
Kiss him goodnight before he squeezes you tight but don't be so fooled, his bark's worse than his bite! [#Legal]
